cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This room has a steady bunk with double bed on the bottom and single bed on top, can be used as double or twin. It has comfortable bedding, tasteful decorated with shelving and hooks. It has plugs to charge devices and sink with mirror.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The double bed room are super comfortable with a luxurious inner sprung mattress, fluffy pillows and duvets. The rooms have beautiful historic sash windows, are tastefully decorated and have plenty of storage space and a bedside table with lamp.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Jan 2026 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Jan 2026 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
